dict.acceptation: 可怕的；极不友好的；极讨厌的；令人震惊的；

sent.orig: Why be opposite horrible do I begin an apathetic again see horror piece feel horrible?
sent.trans: 为什么对恐怖片麻木的我又开始看恐怖片觉得恐怖了？

sent.orig: Horrible piece with horror fiction which more horrible?
sent.trans: 恐怖片和恐怖小说哪个更恐怖？

sent.orig: I was hoping SAC game would see some fires lit, but the DEN game was horrible.
sent.trans: 我希望马刺的比赛能有些火焰，不过对丹佛那场真差劲。

sent.orig: Who said dares are always horrible and scary?
sent.trans: 谁胆敢说总是可怕，可怕吗？
